revised_title: On the Existence of Stigmata in the King Crab and Their Relationship to Respiratory Stigmata of Pulmonate Arachnida
tldr: The author investigates the existence of stigmata in the king crab and their relationship to the respiratory stigmata of pulmonate arachnida, specifically Scorpio. The study reveals several structural and morphological agreements between Limulus and Scorpio, supporting the classification of Limulus as an arachnid.
